decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers:
Masterplans
MP 051 Rev. 00 (Masterplan: Block Plan Setting Out)
MP 060 Rev. 00 (Masterplan: Amenity Diagram)
MP 100 Rev. P4 (Masterplan: Ground Floor Plan)
MP 101 Rev. P2 (Masterplan: First Floor Plan)
MP 111 Rev. P2 (Masterplan: Roof Heights AOD)
MP 112 Rev. P1 (Masterplan: Roof Height Storeys)
MP 113 Rev. P2 (Masterplan: Roof Height PVS)
MP 114 Rev. P0 (Masterplan: Roof Height Colour Coded)
MP 730 Rev. P3 (Masterplan: Parking Layout)
Block B
NFH CTA B 07 X XX DR A 07000 Rev P02
NFH CTA B 07 X XX DR A 07005 Rev P0
NFH CTA B 07 X XX DR A 07003 Rev P02
NFH CTA B 07 X XX DR A 07001 Rev P02
NFH CTA B 07 X XX DR A 07002 Rev P02
NFH CTA B 07 X XX DR A 07004 Rev P02
NFH CTA B 07 X XX DR A 07006 Rev P02
NFH CTA B 07 X XX DR A 07100 Rev P02
NFH CTA B 25 X XX DR A 25901 Rev P01
NFH CTA B 22 X XX DR A 22901 Rev P01
NFH CTA B 20 X XX DR A 20901 Rev P01
The following plans have been APPROVED:
Landscape Masterplan (Revised)
Revised Masterplan - Supporting Landscape Strategy, Rev. P04 07-04-2025, Studio Bosk

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than condition 5, which is superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission ref: 1331/APP/2019/2314, dated 28 June 2021 must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.

The details hereby approved do not prejudice the consideration of Public Art Strategy matters which are to be discharged as an obligation listed under the Section 106 legal agreement attached to Planning Permission ref: 1331/APP/2017/1883.
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 1331/APP/2019/2314, dated 28-06-2021 (Development of 4 no. new buildings comprising residential units (in addition to those approved under planning permission ref: 1331/APP/2017/1883), a basement extension to Block B, flexible commercial uses (Class E) and associated landscaping, access, car parking and other engineering works.) to amend the Landscape Masterplan.
